I ________________ for a pen ________________ this composition.
questions.explanation: We use the present continuous to talk about actions or situations that are going on at the moment of speaking.

questions.question: She ________________ up the stairs slowly because she didn't want ________________
questions.explanation: We use the simple past to say that somebody did something in the past.

questions.question: The teacher ________________ the students ________________ the sum.
Nobody ________________ that he is innocent.
questions.explanation: Since the verb in the subordinate clause is in the present tense, the verb in the main clause is also likely to be in the present or future tense. A past tense seems improbable. Nobody is singular and hence the verb takes the marker -s.
